scripts.clean: rm -rf build; rm -rf node_modules; cd external/devtools/agent; rm -rf build; rm -rf node_modules; cd ../../..; cd external/devtools/inspector; rm -rf build; rm -rf node_modules; cd ../../..; cd external/devtools/console; rm -rf build; rm -rf node_modules; cd ../../..; cd external/devtools/profiler; rm -rf build; rm -rf node_modules; cd ../../..;
scripts.preinstall: if [ -d ".git" ]; then git submodule update -i -r; fi; cd external/devtools/agent; npm install; cd ../../..; cd external/devtools/inspector; npm install; cd ../../..; cd external/devtools/console; npm install; cd ../../..; cd external/devtools/profiler; npm install; cd ../../..;
scripts.postinstall: NODE_ENV=development node main.js coverage | sed 1d > stats/coverage.html; wget `node_modules/.bin/sloc --format json core | node tools/sloc.js` -O stats/comments.badge.png; wget https://codeclimate.com/github/marcominetti/ljve.io.png -O stats/climate.badge.png; wget https://coveralls.io/repos/marcominetti/ljve.io/badge.png?branch=master -O stats/coverage.badge.png;
scripts.test: if [ -f ".travis.yml" ]; then NODE_ENV=test node main.js coverage | sed 1d | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js; else NODE_ENV=development node main.js test; fi;
